setting.location: Beach and the Hispaniola, Treasure Island

characters.appearance: Boy, 13 years old, healthy color returned

characters.action: Passing treasure chests to waiting boats

characters.clothing: Still in blue coat but humbled
characters.action: Using his strength to lift heavy chests

scene.mainElements: Organized transfer of treasure from island to ship, civilization restored after chaos, preparation for departure
scene.details: Multiple small boats ferrying between beach and anchored ship, heavy chests requiring two men to carry, neat organization after pirate chaos, British flag flying proudly on Hispaniola, remaining pirates nowhere to be seen, tropical paradise now just backdrop
scene.background: The Hispaniola at anchor in calm bay, island losing its mystery
scene.atmosphere: Relief and accomplishment, order restored, adventure concluding successfully

composition.cameraAngle: Beach perspective showing boats and ship
composition.depth: Beach activity foreground, boats in surf middle ground, ship at anchor background
